articles.title: President Kim Il Sung's work published in Pakistan
articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung's work published in Pakistan
   Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A famous work of President Kim Il Sung "Let Us Achieve the Great Unity of Our Nation" was published in booklet by the Naerog Publishing House of Pakistan.
   The work is a talk of  President Kim Il Sung to the senior officials of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland and the members of the north headquarters of the national alliance for the country's reunification on August 1, 1991.
   The booklet in the preface noted President Kim Il Sung in the work stressed the necessity to achieve the great unity of the nation and realize national reunification at an early date. 
   The President emphasized that the U.S. troops and nuclear weapons should be withdrawn from south Korea and the concrete wall between the north and south must be pulled down, it added.

articles.title: Secy. Kim Jong Il's work published in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Secy. Kim Jong Il's work published in Bulgaria
   Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A famous work of Secretary Kim Jong Il "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" was published in booklet on Mar. 25  in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Bulgarian Communist Party (MARXISTS)  and  the Dimiter Blagoyev Publishing House of Bulgaria. 
   The work is a discourse published in Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, by Secretary Kim Jong Il on Dec. 25, 1995.

articles.title: Preparatory committees for commemorating President Kim Il Sung's birthday formed abroad
articles.content:
Preparatory committees for commemorating President Kim Il Sung's birthday formed abroad
   Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Preparatory committees for commemorating the 85th birth anniversary of  President Kim Il Sung were lately formed in Guinea, Costa Rica and Bulgaria. 
   Dorank Asipat Diaseni, Minister of Administrative Reform and Decentralization of Guinea= Jose Francisco Aguilar, a laureate of "International Kim Il Sung Prize" and Vice-Director General of the International Institute of the Juche Idea= and Georgy Stoyanov, Chairman of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, were respectively elected the Chairmen of the preparatory committees at the inaugural meetings.
   The preparatory committees set a commemorative period or month and decided to hold various events during the days.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun blasts s. Korea for impeding improvement of DPRK-US. Ties
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun blasts s. Korea for impeding improvement of DPRK-US. Ties
   Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today censures the Kim Young Sam group of south Korea for obstructing the improvement of relations between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the United States.
   In a commentary the daily says: some affirmative signs are now seen in DPRK-U.S. relations, enjoying worldwide welcome. But only the Kim Young Sam group are desperately trying to check the improvement of the DPRK-U.S. ties. of late top officials have flown to south Korea one after another from the U.S. for "accomodation". The Kim Young Sam group have asked them to help maintain a "close cooperation" in dealing with the DPRK.
   By a "close cooperation" with the U.S., they mean concerted efforts with the U.S. to stifle the DPRK militarily. We love peace and want no war. But if the south Korean puppets start a war against the DPRK in alliance with the U.S., we will annihilate them. The Korean people regard sovereignty as valuable as their life and never pardon those who try to infringe upon it.
   If a war breaks out in Korea, not only the south Korean puppets but others siding with them will not be safe.

articles.title: Deliberation needed in deletion of "enemy state" --  Minju Joson
articles.content:
Deliberation needed in deletion of "enemy state" --  Minju Joson
   Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson today urges the United Nations to deliberate on the matter of deleting the term "enemy state" in the UN Charter and make Japan pay for its past crimes as early as possible.
   The daily says in a commentary: As for the matter, it is related to article 53 and article 107 of the UN Charter defining as enemies of humankind those nations which started aggression of other countries in World War II. Therefore, the matter should be resolved in compliance with the original demand of the definition.
   The Japanese authorities have still refused to atone for Japan's crimes in the war but persistently tried to embellish and justify them and cover up its crime-woven history of aggression.
   If Japan is freed from the term "enemy state" now, it will help the country beautify its history of aggression and crime and encourage it to reinvasion.
   It is incompatible with the purpose and principles of the UN Charter for the peace and security of the international community.
   If the United Nations, which should deem democracy, equality and justice the life and blood in its activities, plays into the hands of a certain nation for some money, it cannot discharge its mission as the world body involving most of the countries in the world but have its image tarnished.

articles.title: Press review
articles.content:
Press review
   Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Papers here today report Secretary Kim Jong Il sent thanks to different units, officials, working people and students for doing good things for society and the collective.
   Papers give an account of a Pyongyang meeting to mark the fourth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's famous work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" and carry a report made by Yang Hyong Sop, Chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, at the meeting.
   Papers convey news that symposiums on the Juche idea were held in various circles of society in Pyongyang and preparatory committees were formed in different countries on the occasion of the 85th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   Minju Joson carries an article titled "President Kim Il Sung is the eternal leader of revolutionary cause of Juche".
   Rodong Sinmun rounds up words of world people praising the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, who brilliantly solved the problem of the revolutionary cause.
   Carried in the paper is a message of greetings to the Ist Congress of the Party for Unity and Progress of Guinea from the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
   Printed in the paper is "The Leader is the eternal sun of people", a song newly created in praise of President Kim Il Sung's exploits.
   Under the title "Woman general shining like star in history of army building" the paper introduces the feats of Comrade Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war heroine.
   Econews of the press includes reports about innovation made by working people in the output of chemical fertilizers and timber and land administration.
   Papers observe day of public health.
   Carried in Rodong Sinmun is a statement published at the plenary meeting of the c.c., the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks to mark the 5th anniversary of the Pyongyang Declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism".
   A commentary of the paper accuses the south Korean puppets of entreating the United States for the "Keeping of close anti-DPRK cooperation system" in a bid to put a brake on the improvement of the DPRK-U.S. relations.
   Minju Joson in a commentary stresses that the united nations should pond over the solution to the issue of the "enemy state" article.
   The paper runs an article saying that attempted amendment to the law on land lease for the U.S. troops in Japan is for an insidious purpose.

articles.title: Industrial output value up 19 percent
articles.content:
Industrial output value up 19 percent
   Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Different sectors of the Korean national economy have brought about a great improvement in production.
   According to data available, a gross industrial output value in the first quarter of this year increased by 19 percent as against the fourth quarter of last year.
   In this period the production of coal, ore, lead and zinc, magnesia clinker and light industrial goods drastically increased. Particularly, coal production has gone up 2.8 times and ore production 1.83 times.
   The output of lead and zinc in the first quarter of this year rose by 61 percent, knitwear by 20 percent, cloth by 8 percent and underwear by 6 percent over the same period of last year.
   About 100 more exports production bases have been built and export value attained a 6 percent gain over the first quarter of last year.
   Production is on the increase in power, machine-building, chemical and building-material industries and forestry, too, stepping up the socialist construction as a whole.

articles.title: Chief of Pyongyang mission of NDFSK calls for opening epochal phase for national reunification
articles.content:
Chief of Pyongyang mission of NDFSK calls for opening epochal phase for national reunification
   Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Ri Jong Sang, Chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the National Democratic Front of South Korea (NDFSK), issued a statement to the press on April 4 on the occasion of the fourth anniversary of the publication of "10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation for the reunification of the country", a celebrated work of President Kim Il Sung.
   "10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation for the reunification of the country" is not only a Juche-based platform for national reunification but also one  of the three pillars for the country's reunification together with the three principles of national reunification and the proposal for founding the Democratic Confederal Republic of Koryo, Ri Jong Sang said.
   Originally expounded in the programme are the general target and ideological foundation of great national unity and the principle of promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests and subordinating everything to the cause of national reunification, Ri Jong Sang noted, adding:
   "This programme provides the people in the south with an ideological and spiritual weapon and a theoretical and practical sword for the accomplishment of reunification."
   He pointed out that it is an honorable and worthwhile task of the Korean nation to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country through the implementation of the programme.
   He emphasized that the NDFSK and the patriotic people from all walks of life in the south will certainly overthrow the Kim Young Sam fascist regime and make 1997 a historic year of opening an epochal phase for national reunification by fighting under the banner of the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation.

articles.title: Chief of Syrian mission of NDFSK interviewed
articles.content:
Chief of Syrian mission of NDFSK interviewed
    Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Ri Nam Ho, Chief of the Syrian Mission of the National Democratic Front of South Korea(NDFSK), in an interview with the Syrian paper Al Saura on March 24 said that with rare wisdom, tested guidance and noble virtues President Kim Il Sung and General Kim Jong Il, the greatest men in the world, performed undying feats in the cause of independence and socialism, taking the lead in pulling through severe trials of history. 
   The Korean nation and humankind are infinitely revering and looking up to them as the greatest leaders, statesmen and human beings they acclaimed for the first time in history, he said.
   He referred to important measures adopted at a meeting of the Standing Committee of the Central Committee of the NDFSK to most significantly commemorate April 15 and February 16.
   He went on to say that the south Korean people have turned out in a courageous struggle against dictatorship and fascism in hearty response to the President's behests on reunification, looking up to the respected general.
   He expressed the conviction that the progressive political parties, organisations and broad segments of the people in Syria will express full support for the struggle of the NDFSK and the south Korean people.

articles.title: Symposium to mark President Kim Il Sung's birthday held in Moscow
articles.content:
Symposium to mark President Kim Il Sung's birthday held in Moscow
   Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A scientific symposium on the subject "Comrade Kim Il Sung is the Most Outstanding Party and State Activist" was held in Moscow Wednesday on the occasion of the 85th birth anniversary of leader President  Kim Il Sung.
   Present at the symposium were Ri Tong Chol, Chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia and Chairman of its preparatory committee for commemorating the 85th birth anniversary of the President, vice-chairmen of the preparatory committee  and Russian war veterans, scholars and pressmen.   
   The Ambassador of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to Russia, Son Song Phil, attended the symposium.
   Speakers highly praised President Kim Il Sung as the greatest man, the great leader of the nation and the prominent leader of mankind, and explained his great idea, leadership and virtues.

articles.title: Spring planting in Korea
articles.content:
Spring planting in Korea
   Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Spring planting is in full swing in Korea.
   March and April are the months of tree planting.
   Working people across the country are now out in tree planting, attaining a signal success.
   Over 310 million trees were planted in 60,000 odd hectares of land in recent 15 days, according to data available at the forest management bureau of the Ministry of Land and Environmental Protection.
   Especially, over 68 million trees were planted in some 10,040 hectares of land in south Hwanghae Province and over 61 million trees in some 10,000 hectares of land in north Phyongan Province.
   Over 8 million pine-nut trees and Evodia Daniellii Benn each were planted in Yonan and Paechon counties, south Hwanghae Province.
   Some 70,000 trees were planted along the Pyongyang-Hyangsan tourist road in north and south Phyongan Provinces.
   Trees of economic value and oil bearing trees are being planted in north Hwanghae Province, Kangwon Province and other provinces.

articles.title: Symposiums on Juche idea held on 85th  birthday of President Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Symposiums on Juche idea held on 85th  birthday of President Kim Il Sung
   Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Departmental symposiums on the Juche idea are being held in Pyongyang as part of events commemorating the 85th birth anniversary of  President Kim Il Sung. 
   Men of social science, railway transport, education, culture and art and the press held symposiums on the Juche idea from April 3 to 5.
   The speakers said that the most brilliant exploit performed by the president for the times and humankind is that he founded the immortal Juche idea, the guiding idea of the revolution in the present time.
   It is the great pride of Kim Il Sung's nation to have this great idea, they added.
   It was stressed at the symposiums that the Juche idea indicates revolutionary tasks of all domains arising in the struggle for transforming nature and  society and reeducating man and the profound theories on national liberation, class liberation and human emancipation. It was also emphasized that the idea consummates tasks for all stages of the revolution and ways for their materialisation and strategic and tactical principles for them.
   What holds a particularly important place in the revolutionary exploits of the president is that he successfully solved the issue of inheriting the revolutionary cause, which is vital to a Working-Class Party, the revolution and the destiny of the country and the nation, the speakers stressed.
   They evinced their determination to exalt the undying exploits of the President associated with their domains, singleheartedly united around Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Greetings to Prime Minister of Yugoslavia
articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Yugoslavia
   Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, acting Premier of the Administration Council, sent a message of greetings to Radoje Kontic, upon his reappointment as Prime Minister of Yugoslavia.
   The message wished him great success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country.
   Foreign Minister Kim Yong Nam sent a message of greetings to Milan Milutinovic, upon his reappointment as Foreign Minister of Yugoslavia.

articles.title: Vice-Premier Jang Chol meets Chinese delegation
articles.content:
Vice-Premier Jang Chol meets Chinese delegation
   Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Jang Chol, Vice-Premier and Minister of Culture and Art, met and had a friendly talk with the visiting Chinese government cultural delegation led by Pan Zhenzhou, Vice-Minister of Culture, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
   Present on the occasion were Vice-Minister of Culture and Art Kim Yong Sin and Chinese Ambassador to Korea Wan Yongxiang.
   At the meeting the head of the delegation noted that Sino-Korean cultural exchange has been developing on very good terms. This is greatly helpful to promoting friendship between the two peoples, he said.
   And he expressed the belief that the Korean people will surely make a breakthrough for victory in socialist construction under the wise guidance of Secretary  Kim Jong Il.
   The delegation arrived here on Friday.

articles.title: DPRK government delegation leaves for Viet nam
articles.content:
DPRK government delegation leaves for Viet nam
   Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A government delegation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea headed by Vice-Premier Kong Jin Thae left here today to visit Viet Nam.
   It was seen off at the airport by Chairman Ri Song Dae of the State External Economic Affairs Commission and other officials concerned and Vietnamese Ambassador to Korea Le Xuan Vinh.
